    K 个一组翻转链表

    vuePress-theme-reco    2022

    K 个一组翻转链表

    lvzl

    来源 LeeCode (opens new window)

    给你单链表的头节点 head ，请你反转链表，并返回反转后的链表

    输入：head = [1,2,3,4,5], k = 2 输出：[2,1,4,3,5]

    var reverseKGroup = function (head, k) {
  let arr = [];
  i = 0;
  while (head) {
    arr.push(head.val)
    head = head.next
    ++i
    if (i === k) {
      const current = arr.slice(arr.length - k, arr.length).reverse()
      arr.splice(arr.length - k, k)
      arr = arr.concat(current)
      i = 0
    }
  }
  let res = temp = new ListNode();
  arr.forEach(item => {
    temp.next = new ListNode(item)
    temp = temp.next
  })
  return res.next
};
    Last Updated: 2022-1-6 9:54:38 ├F10: AM┤

    回文链表 合并K个升序链表
